page.title: 02Rolls Royce Ltd, Derby
page.content: The western part of our area is dominated by industrial complexes of which{Rolls Royce}is the largest. It is the city's largest employer. Today the Derby works are solely concerned with the design, development and manufacture of gas turbine{aero {engines}for both military and commercial aircraft. Today the company is one of the western world's top three civil aero engine manufacturers. At present the firm is producing and developing the RB 211 family of engines as used on the Tristar, Boeing 747, 757 and 535 aircraft.Although Rolls Royce has works scattered all over the city, its largest complex is here at Sinfin where, alongside the Aero Division Headquarters are the design centre, precision casting facility and test beds, all of which have an impact on the environment.
